text: Chaetopappa effusa, called the spreading lazy daisy, or spreading leastdaisy, is a North American species of plants in the sunflower family. It has been found only in Texas, largely on the Edwards Plateau.Biota of North America Program 2014 county distribution mapFlora of North America, Spreading lazy daisy, Chaetopappa effusa (A.Gray) ShinnersShinners, Lloyd Herbert 1946. Wrightia 1(2): 68-69 ==References== ==External links== *Excerpts from Jim Conrad's Naturalist Newsletter photos Category:Astereae Category:Endemic flora of Texas Category:Plants described in 1850 Category:Taxa named by Asa Gray
title: Chaetopappa effusa
